basic.Peptide Name: M-zodatoxin-Lt3a (M-ZDTX-Lt3a; Latarcin-3a, Ltc-3a; spiders, Arthropods, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.16735513]Gram-positive bacteria:Arthrobacter globiformis VKM Ac-1112 (MIC=0.3 µM), Bacillus subtilis VKM B-501 MIC=1.2 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli DH5-alpha (MIC=2.5 µM), Escherichia coli MH1 (MIC=6.0 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC>40 µM);Fungi:Pichia pastoris GS115 (MIC=20 µM), Saccharomyces cerevisiae Y190 (MIC=20 µM).
